verses.name: 2 Samuel 12:28
verses.text: Now therefore gather the rest of the people together, and encamp against the city, and take it: lest I take the city, and it be called after my name.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 12:29
verses.text: And David gathered all the people together, and went to Rabbah, and fought against it, and took it.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 12:30
verses.text: And he took their king’s crown from off his head, the weight whereof was a talent of gold with the precious stones: and it was set on David’s head. And he brought forth the spoil of the city in great abundance.
